title: Input Files
content: Matrix Generation Input files can be created in File Manager or here. The input files should confirm to this format.

title: Upload Input Files
content:
Select Upload Input Files.
1. Select Create New Folder or Select an Existing Folder. Choose a folder to enable Upload Files button
2. Click Upload files in Existing or New Folder, the files should confirm the format of Matrix Generation Input files.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
Select Select Existing Folder radio.
1. Click Select Folder to select a Text Capture output folder as an input folder to run Matrix Generation.
